name: Toki Pona Island
description:
Toki Pona Island is 2D language learning adventure game!

After a teleportation incident, you wake up on a tropical island inhabited by a variety of interesting locals. Unfortunately, none of them speak your language. Therefore, you'll have to learn theirs instead if you want to cooperate. The good news is that the Toki Pona is relatively easy language to learn. Slowly, but surely you'll acquire more of the language, learn to understand the grammar, and build familiarity with common phrases. Master this unfamiliar language and you might just find a way to make it back home!

Features

  • A whole tropical island to explore.
  • Over 2 dozen quests.
  • Comprehensive grammar lessons.
  • A cast of unique characters.
  • An easy to use translation system.
  • Non-linear story progression.
  • Full Xbox controller support.
